data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 4, Free kick Cerezo.
Cerezo have a dangerous throw-in.
Cerezo takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 5, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Cerezo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 12, Carlinhos Junior is back on his feet again.
Throw-in Shimizu.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Shimizu.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 19, Cerezo are coming forward and Hiroaki Okuno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Cerezo close to the penalty box.
Cerezo are pushing forward but Yuta Toyokawa's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Cerezo takes a corner from the right.
Yusuke Goto of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 25, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo drives forward and Hiroshi Kiyotake gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Cerezo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Goal kick for Cerezo at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in high up the field for Shimizu in Shizuoka.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cerezo's half?
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Keita Nakamura is replacing Shota Kaneko for the home team.
Shimizu make their second substitution with Yuito Suzuki replacing Yusuke Goto.
In the minute 47, Cerezo needs to be cautious. Shimizu have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Renato Augusto.
In the minute 52, Shimizu pushes forward through Kenta Nishizawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shimizu's Renato Augusto misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
The away team replace Naoyuki Fujita with Yoichiro Kakitani.
Bruno Pereira Mendes is on a sub for Yuta Toyokawa for Cerezo.
In the minute 58, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Takashi Kanai.
It seems as if Takashi Kanai is unable to continue. Yugo Tatsuta replaces him for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 61, Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Shimizu are pushing forward but Elsinho's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 63, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Hiroshi Kiyotake.
In the minute 67, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with an assist there.
Cerezo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Shimizu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Shizuoka.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Riku Matsuda (Cerezo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Ryo Takeuchi with Kota Miyamoto.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 78, Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
Cerezo are coming forward and Bruno Pereira Mendes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Shimizu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Shimizu.
Keita Nakamura of Shimizu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
Eiichi Katayama is on a sub for Yusuke Maruhashi for Cerezo.
In the minute 86, Keita Nakamura puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Great play from Carlinhos Junior to set up the goal.
Cerezo's Hiroshi Kiyotake misses with an attempt on goal.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Shimizu.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bruno Pereira Mendes of Cerezo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Shimizu's Keita Nakamura is on target but unsuccessful.
Cerezo are in shooting range from this free kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Teerasil Dangda is replacing Kenta Nishizawa for the home team.
Goal! Carlinhos Junior extends Shimizu's lead to 3-1.
That's a fine assist from Teerasil Dangda.
